caption: Start or stop relative dimming

de.{Steps, select, 0 {Stops} other {Starts}: {Steps, select, 0 {Stoppe} other {Starte}} dimmen {TARGET, object} {Steps, select, 0 {} other {mit {Steps, number} % Schritten}}
de.Start/stop relative dimming. Use positiv: Startet/Stoppe relatives Dimmen. Verwende positive Werte zum Aufdimmen, negative Werte zum Abdimmen oder Null zu stoppen.

format: {Steps, select, 0 {Stops} other {Starts}} dimming {TARGET, object} {Steps, select, 0 {} other {with {Steps, number} % steps}}
description: Start/stop relative dimming. Use positive Values to dim up, negative values to dim down or zero to stop.
